text: Ni tinchigaonaga matumbi ni kugaganichisyaga kuti gali chilimbanganile (mâ€™malo mwakwe), nambo kutendaga gali nkwenda mugakwendelaga mawunde gawula. (Gele) nimasengo ga Allah Ajula jwaachikolosisye chenene chindu chilichose. Chisimu Jwalakwe ni Nkusimanya chenene abali syosope sya yankutenda
